projects.title: Identifying Distracted Driver using Pose Estimation & CNN
projects.bodyText:
- Utilized a variety of Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) architectures, including VGG16, ResNet50, and ResNet101-based CNNs, for comprehensive training, leveraging Python and OpenCV to process and analyze images for pose estimation tasks.
 -  Developed a pose estimation method with the help of Mediapipe framework for distracted driver.
 - Implemented and fine-tuned machine learning algorithms, achieving an accuracy improvement of >20% in identifying driver distraction cues.

projects.title: Memory Match Bot: Integrating UR3 Robotic Arm & Computer Vision
projects.bodyText:
- Led the integration of a UR3 robotic arm with computer vision capabilities to automate a memory card game, improving the application of interactive technologies.
 - Developed and implemented template matching algorithms for the accurate detection of card suits, enhancing the system's ability to perform rapid and reliable pattern recognition using computer vision techniques.
 - Applied knowledge of forward and inverse kinematics to achieve precise control of the UR3 robotic arm, enabling accurate positioning from pixel-to-world frame transformations.

projects.title: Vision based Lane Tracking & Obstacle Avoidance on F1 Tenth Car
projects.bodyText:
- Utilized RealSense D435i camera and computer vision techniques for precise lane detection and following, ensuring the F1 Tenth Car remains within its designated lane.
 - Integrated the Shi-Tomasi algorithm for real-time obstacle detection and avoidance, enabling dynamic response to unexpected obstacles on the track.
 - Incorporated a pure pursuit controller for steering and a PID controller for acceleration, improving the vehicle's manoeuvrability and speed control.
 - Conducted thorough camera calibration and employed advanced image processing techniques, converting RGB images to HSV and applying color thresholding for effective lane detection.

projects.title: PosTrack: Smart Posture Detection
projects.bodyText:
- Created an innovative webcam-based posture detection system using computer vision to monitor and improve user posture in real-time, addressing the shortcomings of sensor-based and machine learning approaches.
 - Utilized MediaPipe’s face mesh and pose estimation solutions to detect facial and body landmarks for posture analysis.
 - Developed non-intrusive, cost effective & user friendly system that requires no additional hardware, leveraging existing webcams for ease of integration into daily routines.

projects.title: State Estimation on GEM e4 for Autonomous Vehicles
projects.bodyText:
- Worked on state estimation for the GEM e4 autonomous vehicle, integrating GNSS and IMU data for accurate sensor fusion.
 - Applied and tested various versions of Kalman Filters, including Extended Kalman Filter (EKF) and Unscented Kalman Filter (UKF), to improve state estimation accuracy.
 - Utilized GNSS and IMU data to enhance the vehicle's perception and navigation capabilities, ensuring reliable performance in diverse environments.
 - Conducted simulations and real-world testing to validate the performance of the implemented state estimation algorithms.

projects.title: Indoor Localization & Surveillance System using Raspberry Pi
projects.bodyText:
- Utilized Raspberry Pi with SenseHat for environmental sensing and Pi Camera for motion detection and surveillance, creating a reliable indoor monitoring solution.
 - Employed OpenCV’s HAAR Cascade Model for real-time face tracking and background subtraction to improve surveillance accuracy.
 - Applied Received Signal Strength Indicator (RSSI) values and Pedestrian Dead Reckoning (PDR) algorithms to accurately determine the location of surveillance devices within indoor environments.

projects.title: Enhancing Autonomous Vehicle by Object Detection & Predictive Tracking using Deep Learning Methods
projects.bodyText:
- Implemented advanced object detection and predictive tracking algorithms using deep learning methods to enhance the safety and reliability of autonomous vehicles.
 - Utilized state-of-the-art algorithms like YOLO-NAS with DeepSORT to improve real-time object recognition and tracking capabilities under varying environmental conditions.
 - Implemented Kalman filters and Hungarian algorithms within the DeepSORT tracking system for effective data association and tracking in real-time applications.

projects.title: Employing Biomedical Signals as a means of Biometric Identification
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a high-security biometric identification system using **EEG** signals to ensure robust human recognition. Implemented using advanced 1D **CNN** and **LSTM** architectures.
 - Leveraged **deep learning** to analyze EEG signals, achieving an impressive **accuracy** of **99.97% with LSTM** and **99.35% with CNN**, demonstrating the efficacy of **neural networks** in handling **time-series** biomedical data.
 - Designed and tested models using different neural network configurations and EEG data channel subsets, optimizing for computational efficiency and **real-time** application feasibility.
 - Effectively **collaborated with peers** on the project team, taking a **leading role in managing and plannin** the project's workflow.
 - Contributed to academic knowledge by publishing a paper in an international journal.
